review: This game has given me both fun memories, introduced me to the friends I know today, and        overall was a fun time. How is it now? I sadly can't recommend this game to anyone who is        looking for an FPS to play. As of this review, cheating bots have swarmed the Valve        official match making servers and are now asking for money just for players to be 'immune'        to bots (yes, this is an actual thing that is going on and casual just feels unsafe now        that the bot owners are now asking for money just for it to all stop.)        It doesn't help either that the silence and neglect from the dev team shows that this game        will not last long, granted yes community servers are quite possibly the best to go to as        of right now but the fact that it got this far especially now in 2021 when the whole        situation with bots has been happening since around the beginning of 2020 and all thats        happened to this game is Free to Play users are actually getting silenced while the        cheating bots managed to bypass any of all types measures the team already did for the        game.        Valve, if you read this then I urge you to please...look into the match making servers of        this game, update your anti-cheat, something. Many of the members of this community are        asking you to just do something against the bots when all solutions have been nothing but        negatives on the game and some people may or already have jumped ship. I already jumped        ship because I was tired of waiting for any sort of response to the whole situation with        the bots, that its better to play something fun than wait for something only to expect        false promises.        To those who read this review, if you want to play this game still despite my thoughts on        this I urge you to play on community servers. The casual rank does not matter in the        slightest, trust me. But as I stated before..I advise staying away from this game. Too        much neglect from the devs and radio silence from said devs has made this game unplayable        in official Valve matchmaking.        If the situation changes regarding this game, my review will be changed. Until then stay        far away from this one.

This is my love letter to Team Fortress 2.        Basically, if you did encounter it randomly - like through the memes (there are maany),        then I recommend you playing it.        But listen out - there is something, that no-one is brave to say.        The game will slowly fade away. Why?        It's not optimized. It's not being updated. It's... terrible.        But that's not the case, my dear. Valve has created a universe with Pixar level quality,        except with guns and blood. And it's awesome.        You will enjoy hundreds of animations, posters... Because they are amazing. But the game        itself? Try something else.        Final conclusion is - that fanbase is much, much better, than the game itself. But        nevertheless, if you did not ever try it - go ahead! I spent a thousand of hours here, and        I don't regret a second.
